attributes.action: The government should extend driving theory test for 1 year
attributes.additional_details: The government should extend driving theory for at least 1 year most of the people didn’t notice there was a voting going for the driving extend because of COVID-19 there are people waiting for 6/7 months for a test so my request to the government to give us another chance for driving theory voting
attributes.background: The government should extend driving theory for at least 1 year most of the people didn’t notice there was a voting going for the driving extend because of COVID-19 there are people waiting for 6/7 months for a test so my request to the government to give us another chance for driving theory voting
